name: Dungeoneer (itch) (erikdewhurst)
description:
It's dark, dank, and definitely inhospitable.
But your boots and wits will get you through.

Dungoneer is a simple study of puzzle-dungeon mechanics with a dark aesthetic that might just make you feel a chill. 

This first version includes 5 dynamic-maze dungeons.
Additional dungeons may be added as dictated by interest.
